Need Internet Connection
11/26/2015

Customer review by Mike

5.0 stars 11/26/2015 by Mike
by Mike

Didn't realize the importance of having the internet connection for the PS4, but it is imperative to be able to operate it properly. But otherwise, it's going good. The Star Wars Battlefront game took FOREVER to install tho and that was a big pain. But overall I'm liking the PS4 so far, especially all the neat little features it has: I can stream YouTube and watch those videos on here, as well as Netflix and Hulu too. Personally I am not big on the game sharing, following other players, and multiple game playing stuff. Don't care for any of that. I am looking forward to seeing if this thing can play regular DVD's.....I think it can. But finally, I feel this was definitely worth the money spent on it, this is a tool for the young people that's for sure, but overall I'm happy with it.
